markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 0"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Basic Crutch](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1344)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 67</row>

_[**PFS Note**](/pathfinder-society) All Pathfinder Society agents also have access to all assistive items from Morhen’s Mobility Apparel_

**Price** 5 sp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Crutches come as singles or a pair depending on how much support you need while walking. A crutch fits under your armpit, and you use your hand and the swing of your arm to move with them.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Basic Crutch
